snippet: The Mexican authorities announced Wednesday that captured members of a criminal cell had confessed to the killing of five journalists in the state of Veracruz this year.
abstract: Mexican authorities announce that captured members of a criminal cell have confessed to the killing of five journalists in the state of Veracruz.
lead_paragraph: The Mexican authorities announced Wednesday that captured members of a criminal cell had confessed to the killing of five journalists in the state of Veracruz this year.

headline.seo: Confessions Are Reported In Journalist Killings in Mexico
headline.main: Mexico: Confessions Are Reported in the Killing of 5 Journalists
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Confessions Are Reported In the Killing of 5 Journalists
